    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kippur (Sefer Yonah) 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners finish reading Sefer Yonah and learn why Yonah was so uncomfortable carrying out God's mission.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sefer Yonah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yom kippur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maftir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger beenden Messwert Sefer Yonah und 
erlernen, warum Yonah Mission des so unbequemen durchführenden Gottes
war.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants terminent la lecture Sefer Yonah et
apprennent pourquoi Yonah était la mission de Dieu de mise en oeuvre 
tellement inconfortable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners terminam a leitura Sefer Yonah e 
aprendem porque Yonah era missão do deus se realizando assim 
incômodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti rifiniscono la lettura Sefer Yonah 
ed imparano perchè Yonah era missione del dio d'avanzamento così 
scomodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι τελειώνουν Sefer Yonah και μαθαίνουν 
γιατί Yonah ήταν τόσο ανήσυχο πραγματοποιώντας την αποστολή 
του Θεού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes acaban la lectura Sefer Yonah y 
aprenden porqué Yonah era misión del dios que realizaba tan 
incómodo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sefer Yonah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">yom kippur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">maftir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
